# focusedWindow

**Instance Property**

The window that currently has focus for this extension.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var focusedWindow: (any WKWebExtensionWindow)? { get }
```

## Discussion

Provides the window that currently has focus, as set by the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionContext/didFocusWindow(_:)] method.

It will be `nil` if no window has focus or if a window has focus that is not visible to the extension. Initially populated by the window returned by the extension controller delegate method [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionControllerDelegate/webExtensionController(_:focusedWindowFor:)].

## Related Documentation

- **didFocusWindow(_:)**: Called by the app when a window gains focus to fire appropriate events with only this extension.
